get.description:
Fetch a paginated list of all products.

Requires the products_reader role to access.

post.description:
Create a new product.

Requires the products_writer role to access.

get.description:
Fetches a single product, including its currently active set of rules.

Requires the product_reader role to access.

put.description:
Updates a products definition.

Requires the products_writer role to access.

delete.description:
Deletes a product from the system.

Requires the product_remover role to access.

get.description:
Get a paginated list of all rule sets in the system. Can use a date to search for the active rule sets.

Requires the product_reader role to access.

parameters.name: perpage
parameters.description: Set to -1 to return all rule sets.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date to use to query for active rule sets on that date.

post.description:
Create a new rule set.

Requires the product_writer role to access.

get.description:
Fetch a single rule set.

Requires the product_reader role to access.

put.description:
Update a rule.

Requires the product_writer role to access.

delete.description:
Deletes a rule set.

Requires the product_remover role to access.

parameters.name: perpage
parameters.description: Set to -1 to return all rules.

get.description:
Fetches a paginated list of rules for the product.

Requires the product_reader role to access.

post.description:
Creates a new set of rules on a product.

Requires the product_writer role to access.

get.description:
Fetch a single ruleset for a product.

Requires the product_reader role to access.

delete.description:
Deletes a rule set from a product.

Requires the product_remover role to access.

put.description:
Updates a product rule set.

Requires the product_writer role to access.

validationSchema.description: JSON schema for validating data contract to guarantees API.
